Package uk.ac.tees.L1087591.bronze

This package contains the solution to the BRONZE task for AJP-P7.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BotswanaFlight
    BotswanaFlight is responsible for a flight to Botswana.
    EntertainmentUpgrade
    EntertainmentUpgrade responsible for entertaining and adding the cost of entertaining.
    FirstClassUpgrade
    FirstClassUpgrade is responsible for the Upgrading to first class and adding the price.
    Flight
    Flight is a abstract class.
    FlightUpgrade
    FlightUpgrade is responsible for all the upgrades to the flights for web/refreshments/entertainment/first class/priority.
    IndiaFlight
    IndiaFlight represent a flight to India.
    PriorityUpgrade
    PriorityUpgrade is responsible for the priority boarding.
    RefreshmentUpgrade
    RefreshmentUpgrade is responsible for the refreshments and adding the cost.
    SriLankaFlight
    SriLankaFlight is responsible for flight to SriLanka.
    WebCheckInUpgrade
    WebCheckInUpgrade is responsible for the web check in and adding the cost.

Package uk.ac.tees.L1087591.bronze Description

This package contains the solution to the BRONZE task for AJP-P7. which represents the Decorator pattern
